text: Hey Neal, it’s Giacomo, your mentee! I have noticed that the notification system on Slack is buggy at times. I just wanted to introduce myself :grin: I’m currently studying VFX at Escape Studios, hoping to go into compositing and move on to be a VFX Supervisor. The number one thing I’ve always wanted to know from a seasoned compositor and freelancer as yourself is what is it like working for many different studios. Are their pipelines different, maybe better than one another. Have you learned anything I might benefit from along the way? Do you have a favourite movie that you worked on? Sorry for the overload of questions but I’m very thankful for this opportunity. Thank you for taking time out of your busy day to do this

Hello Giocomo. Sorry I have not responded to your above messages, I did not get any notifications to say I had a new message. I'll respond to the questions a bit later today but in the meantime it could be worth checking out this link <https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6467702642339643393>

attachments.title: Amy Smith on LinkedIn: "Just a reminder that #VFX #apprenticeships are open for applications. Lots of studios and therefore opportunities available this year! One more week to apply! #LaunchFS http://ow.ly/WvPO30myBYx"
